sqlMap.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_.*, rownum rownum_ FROM (

select iid.seq_id, iid.company_id branch_id, cb.branch_name, iid.classCode, iid.className, iid.product_code, iid.product_name, iid.status, iid.riskName, iid.riskCode, cb.branch_id parcode, cb.branch_name parname, iid.bjtype, se.enum_name bjtypename from CBS_SMC_RISKCODE iid left join cpy_branch cb on cb.branch_id = iid.COMPANY_ID left join Sys_Enum se on iid.bjtype=se.enum_code and se.up_enum='classcode' where 1 = 1
AND iid.company_id = #branch_id#
AND iid.className like '%$product_name$%'
AND iid.product_code = #product_code#
AND iid.riskName like '%$riskName$%'
AND iid.riskCode like '%$riskCode$%'
and cb.bleng_branchid IN (SELECT tt.branch_id FROM SYS_BRANCH tt WHERE tt.STATUS = '1' START WITH tt.BRANCH_ID IN (SELECT TDA.DATA_AUTH_NO FROM T_DATA_AUTH TDA WHERE TDA.IS_HALF_CHECK IS NULL AND TDA.OBJECT_NO = #modifyUser# AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'USER') CONNECT BY PRIOR tt.BRANCH_ID = tt.BRANCH_PARENTID) ORDER BY IID.Modifydate DESC, iid.create_time DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CBS_SMC_RISKCODE (COMPANY_ID, CLASSCODE, CLASSNAME, RISKNAME, RISKCODE, MODIFYDATE, Create_Time, STATUS, bjtype) VALUES ( #branch_id#, #classCode#, #className#, #riskName#, #riskCode#, sysdate, sysdate, '1', #bjtype#)
sqlMap.update: update CBS_SMC_RISKCODE set company_id=#branch_id# ,classCode=#classCode# ,className=#className# ,product_code=#product_code# ,product_name=#product_name# ,riskName=#riskName# ,riskCode=#riskCode# ,Modifydate=sysdate ,bjtype=#bjtype# where seq_id=#seq_id#
sqlMap.select: select iid.seq_id, iid.company_id branch_id, cb.branch_name, iid.classCode, iid.className, iid.product_code, iid.product_name, iid.riskName, iid.riskCode, iid.bjtype, se.enum_name bjtypename from CBS_SMC_RISKCODE iid left join cpy_branch cb on cb.branch_id = iid.COMPANY_ID left join Sys_Enum se on iid.bjtype=se.enum_code and se.up_enum='classcode' where iid.seq_id = #seq_id#
select * from CBS_SMC_RISKCODE where riskCode=#riskCode# and product_source=#product_source#

select PRODUCT_ID classCode,PRODUCT_NAME className from sys_ins_risk where CATEGORY='1'
and companyid=#branch_id#
select PRODUCT_ID riskCode,PRODUCT_NAME riskName from sys_ins_risk where CATEGORY='2' and parent_id = #classCode#
select PRODUCT_ID type_code,PRODUCT_NAME type_name from sys_ins_risk where CATEGORY='3' and parent_id = #riskCode#
select branch_id,branch_name from cpy_branch where branch_level = '1'
sqlMap.update: update CBS_SMC_RISKCODE set status = #status#,Modifydate=sysdate where seq_id=#seq_id#
sqlMap.select: select id,name,pid from ( select distinct branch_id id, branch_name name, branch_parentid pid from cpy_branch t where t.status ='1' ) order by id
select sir.poundage from SYS_INS_RISK sir where sir.product_id = #classCode#

select iid.seq_id, iid.company_id branch_id, cb.branch_name, iid.classCode, iid.className, iid.product_code, iid.product_name, iid.status, iid.riskName, iid.riskCode, cb.branch_id parcode, cb.branch_name parname, iid.bjtype, se.enum_name bjtypename from CBS_SMC_RISKCODE iid left join cpy_branch cb on cb.branch_id = iid.COMPANY_ID left join Sys_Enum se on iid.bjtype=se.enum_code and se.up_enum='classcode' where 1 = 1
AND iid.company_id = #branch_id#
AND iid.className like '%$product_name$%'
AND iid.product_code = #product_code#
AND iid.riskName like '%$riskName$%'
AND iid.riskCode like '%$riskCode$%'
and cb.bleng_branchid IN (SELECT tt.branch_id FROM SYS_BRANCH tt WHERE tt.STATUS = '1' START WITH tt.BRANCH_ID IN (SELECT TDA.DATA_AUTH_NO FROM T_DATA_AUTH TDA WHERE TDA.IS_HALF_CHECK IS NULL AND TDA.OBJECT_NO = #modifyUser# AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'USER') CONNECT BY PRIOR tt.BRANCH_ID = tt.BRANCH_PARENTID) ORDER BY IID.Modifydate DESC, iid.create_time DESC
SELECT cb.branch_name FROM CPY_BRANCH CB WHERE CB.BRANCH_LEVEL = '1' AND CB.BRANCH_ID = #branch_id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CBS_SMC_RISKCODE (COMPANY_ID, CLASSCODE, CLASSNAME, RISKNAME, RISKCODE, MODIFYDATE, Create_Time, STATUS, bjtype) VALUES ( #branch_id#, #classCode#, #className#, #riskName#, #riskCode#, sysdate, sysdate, '1', (SELECT se.enum_code FROM Sys_Enum se WHERE se.up_enum='classcode' AND se.enum_name=#bjtypename#))
sqlMap.select:
SELECT distinct COMPANY_ID branch_id,RISKCODE riskCode,RISKNAME riskName FROM CBS_SMC_RISKCODE CB,Sys_Enum t WHERE t.up_enum='classcode' AND cb.bjtype=t.enum_code and CB.COMPANY_ID=#branch_id#
and CB.RISKCODE=#riskCode#
and cb.seq_id!=#seq_id#
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_Enum t WHERE t.enum_parentid='classcode' AND to_char(t.enum_desc)=#classCode# AND to_char(t.enum_code)=#rtype#

SELECT cb.seq_id,cb.branch_parentid,cb.branch_id,cb.branch_name,cb.branch_level,cb.status FROM cpy_branch cb WHERE cb.bleng_branchid IN (SELECT tt.branch_id FROM SYS_BRANCH tt WHERE tt.STATUS = '1' START WITH tt.BRANCH_ID IN (SELECT TDA.DATA_AUTH_NO FROM T_DATA_AUTH TDA WHERE TDA.IS_HALF_CHECK IS NULL AND TDA.OBJECT_NO = #modifyUser# AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'USER') CONNECT BY PRIOR tt.BRANCH_ID = tt.BRANCH_PARENTID) and cb.status=1 AND cb.branch_level='1' AND cb.branch_id=#branch_id#

SELECT se.enum_code bjtype,se.enum_name bjtypename FROM Sys_Enum se WHERE se.up_enum='classcode' AND se.enum_code LIKE (select case when dept_type = '02' THEN '1%' when dept_type = '01' then '0%' else '%%' END from Sys_Enum where up_enum = 'headoffice' and enum_code = #branch_id#)
SELECT cp.ins_type FROM cpy_branch cp WHERE cp.branch_id=#branch_id#
sqlMap.update: update CBS_SMC_RISKCODE set className = #className#, classCode = #classCode# where COMPANY_ID = trim(#branch_id#) and riskCode = trim(#riskCode#) and riskName = trim(#riskName#)
